profile:
Who is Hot Electric?

We’re a talented team of dedicated professional electricians who pride ourselves on hard work, honesty, and integrity to reveal excellent customer service. Plus, we are fully committed to getting the job done safely, no matter the challenge. Our friendly electricians will look after you from start to finish, so that you have peace of mind and enjoy the results.

We offer a holistic approach for you, not only benefitting from our electrical service, but also providing information and resources to help for a sustainable future.

Why Hot Electric?

-Calling us is simple; we listen and we care, exactly what you deserve
-Flexible scheduling
-Quick response
-Customized electrical services to meet your needs
-Highly trained, honest technicians
-We ensure you get more bang for your buck
-Government licensed and bonded
-We offer free quotes

Hot Electric's Service Guarantee

We want our customers to be satisfied with their choice in Hot Electric, every step of the way.

Our goal is to provide you with consistent, superior customer service and an unforgettable experience.

To ensure that Hot Electric provides this to you, we have implemented a service guarantee to show our commitment for prompt service to all our customers.

-We guarantee the quality of our work for 1 year. Any problems that occur due to faulty workmanship within the first year will be repaired free of charge. Warranty for parts is as per manufacturer's specifications and labour for the installation of the said parts is 30 days.

-We guarantee an accurate invoice, plus a fair and honest quote.

-We will respect each customer’s property as it is a fundamental courtesy of our company. We will always provide drop cloths and booties in our customer’s home.

-We guarantee a timely and reasonable response to your call. We will show up on time and if not you will receive a courtesy call informing you in that occurrence.

-We will provide courteous customer service. If there is any way to improve our service we encourage customers to let us know. We value all feedback that will help us better serve our customers.

Electrical Services we provide:

-Renovations or new builds
-Troubleshooting
-Aluminum wiring upgrade
-Knob and tube wiring upgrade
-Home inspections
-Panel and breaker upgrade
-Sub Panels
-Service Upgrades
-Dedicated Circuits

-Safety: Arc fault protection, Ground fault protection, Tamper Resistant receptacles, Grounding and bonding, Surge protection and Smoke/CO detectors

-Lighting: Pot lights, Track lights, Chandeliers, Under cabinet lighting, Garden lighting, Security lighting and Energy efficient solutions

-Fans: Ceiling Fans, Bathroom Fans, Range hood Fans and ducting

-Heating: Baseboard Heaters, Floor Heating and Kick space Heaters, Hot Tubs, Spas and Saunas

-Low Voltage Wiring: Telephone, Coax and Data Cabling, Sound systems, Home Theatre and TV mounting

Brands:Square D, Siemens, Cutler Hammer, Leviton, Pass and Seymour, FPE, Sneider Electric, GE, Standard, Hubbell, Schneider
service_area: Lower Mainland (Vancouver, West Vancouver, North Vancouver, Downtown, Richmond, Burnaby, Delta, Surrey, South Surrey, White Rock, New Westminister, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody, Langley, Cloverdale, Aldergrove, and Maple Ridge. Fraser Valley (Abbotsford, Mission, and Chilliwack)
